name: sublime-tipJS-snippets
tagline: Code snippets for developing with tipJS JavaScript MVC Framework
body:
### Sublime Text 2 tipJS snippets
Code snippets for developing with [tipJS.com – Open Source JavaScript MVC Framework][tipjs].
[Sublime Text 2][sublime] 에서 [tipJS][tipjs] 를 쉽게 사용하기 위한 스니펫 모음입니다.
현재는 config, define, model, controller, view 를 지원합니다.

## Installation ##

현재 [wbond's Package Control][package_control] 에 승인요청중입니다.

### Without Package Control ###

#### Mac OS ####
 
    cd "~/Library/Application Support/Sublime Text 2/Packages"
  
#### Windows 7 ####

    cd "C:\Users\YOUR_USERNAME\AppData\Roaming\Sublime Text 2\Packages"

#### Inside _Packages_ ####

    git clone https://github.com/rkjun/sublime-tipjs-snippets.git "tipJS"

### Authors and Contributors
@rkJun

### Support or Contact
[tipJS 공식사이트][tipjs]


[tipjs]: http://tipjs.com/
[sublime]: http://www.sublimetext.com/
[sublime3]: http://www.sublimetext.com/3
[package_control]: http://wbond.net/sublime_packages/package_control
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
